entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Custom Elements not rendering as/when expected #40318
  • staticwebassets.runtime.json also includes files from referenced RCL NuGet package #40317
  • [NativeAOT] - IL trimming warnings. #40315
  • blazor wasm using new Claim("roles", role) cause @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "admin")] not work #40314
  • API1000 analyser should recognise annotations in XML docs #40312
  • Similar to MarkupString but for custom components. #40311

Closed

  • Unhandled exception rendering component: The provided expression contains a PropertyExpression which is not supported. FieldIdentifier only supports simple member accessors (fields, properties) of an object #39906
    5.0.x
  • Dynamic routing #40265
  • Blazor documentation needs additional real usage examples for settings #40288
  • Issue running BlazorWebAssemblyCustomInitialization sample #40195
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor in CSS preprocessor support #40281
  • Why BadHttpRequest is logged twice (as INFO and ERROR) #39907
    7.0-preview3
  • .NET 6 RC2 Blazor with server side rendering and Azure B2C #37713
    Discussions
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-43877 | ASP.NET Core Elevation of privilege Vulnerability #39028
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a switch to defer rendering of components in ComponentTagHelper #40316
  • Only enable trailers/reset/goaway on OSs that support them #40310
    area-runtime
  • Add aspnet-build ownership of Version files #40309

Merged

  • Bump Polly to 7.2.3 #40284
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Log IIS BadHttpRequestExceptions at debug level #40002
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use PackageConflictPreferredPackages for analyzers from transport package #40216
    area-infrastructure
  • Use LoggerMessageAttribute in more places #40297
    area-runtime
  • Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40305
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40218
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16
